flawed_nl_solution:
The total speed of all five coasters is 295 because 59 x 5 = <<295=295>>295
The final coaster went 41 miles per hour because 295 - 50 - 62 - 73 - 70 = <<295-50-62-73-70=41>>41
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 41. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
